title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories on the x axis representing Ship Type, and Number of ships in each Ship Type on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Chartered where Number of ships is 397.0.
The lowest category is found at Orderbook where Number of ships is 13.0.
The highest value at Chartered is almost 30.54 times larger than the minimum value of Orderbook.
The highest value at Chartered is almost 30.54 times larger than the minimum value of Orderbook.
The difference between the max Ship Type Chartered and min Ship Type Orderbook is 384.0.
